name: Dreamland Genesis
description:
Lore

In Dreamland Genesis you play as a ghost hunter who tries to uncover the secrets of a cursed asylum where people  died under mysterious circumstances. Gather evidence of supernatural occurrences and find out what happened before it closed.

Your goal is to find all 10 evidences, hidden on the map, also there are 3 secrets, one of which is a secret ending you can unlock.

If you enjoyed the game, please consider supporting me, by writing a comment, following me on Itch.IO and YouTube and/ or paying for this game.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • MOUSE to look
  • RMB to zoom
  • LMB Action 1
  • E to interact
  • CTRL to crouch

System Requirements

  • 800 MB free space
  • Quad Core CPU or better
  • 2GB DDR3 RAM
  • 512MB VRAM
